about_the_game:
Game description:

The male protagonist, Shota, is a college student who is about to enter the workplace, and he decides to do a workplace internship before graduation. I hope to gain more experience and growth through internships. During his internship, he met his colleague Narisse, who is a business expert in the company and is extremely serious and responsible for her work.
At the same time, Shota has a very close relationship with his classmates who have always adored him at school, and they help each other complete their graduation homework.
Throughout the story, many conversations and interactions take place between Shota and his friends, and their previous relationship becomes closer through the development of the plot.
One day, Shota heard that there were always some strange sounds in the school building at night, which made the students feel strange and uneasy, what caused it? Shota decided to find out for himself.

Game elements


Storyline
Modern background
Novel content
Multiple endings
Players interact with the protagonist to communicate with company colleagues, school classmates, etc., and interact to complete the main story progression
The story has few missions and a simple plot, defeating the witch to win the game!
The game is available in both Japanese and Chinese languages, and players can switch between settings and switch running modes

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages, or may not be suitable for viewing at work: nudity or sexual content, general adult content, all characters involved in sexual content are over 18 years old, does not contain any underage material, All game characters are fictional.

name: 翔太の毕业季

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i Processor Series (Low Voltage Processor is not supported)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card that supports DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: Support Pixel Phaders 2.0 or higher required / A pointing device required
